falsificationAttempts.targetDescription: Convex-ID-based idempotency may be insufficient if prompts change across retries.
falsificationQueries: Consider cases where prompts or params change without ID changes
Assess need for request_version or attempt fields
falsificationAttempts.falsificationAnalysis: User preference is to rely on Convex IDs and null checks; adding request_version may be a safeguard if prompt changes are allowed.
